DOC.brief_summary: Study title : The Efficacy Safety tooth bleaching procedure use Y10 Whitening toothpaste RF current The Device : The Brighttonix Y10 Tooth Whitening system indicate use painless non-invasive tooth whiten treatment . Design : Single center , randomize , control , double blind , two-arm , prospective clinical study . Follow visit 7 day ( phone visit ) , 12 week 26 week .
DOC.brief_title: The Efficacy Safety Tooth Bleaching Procedure Using Y10 Whitening Toothpaste RF Current
DOC.detailed_description: Purpose : To assess efficacy safety tooth bleaching procedure use Y10 Whitening toothpaste RF current ( Y10 Device ) , versus placebo ( RF current off- -shelf non bleach toothpaste ) healthy patient seek tooth bleaching . No . Subjects/Sites : A total 60 patient Hadassah Medical Center randomize , 30 patient test arm , 30 patient placebo arm . A 40 % 60 % male ( female ) ratio maintain . Target teeth : At least 4 teeth teeth 13-23 ( Upper front teeth ) accord international teeth number system . Upper low teeth treat treatment arm described . Endpoints : Primary endpoint : • At end treatment ( V3 ) , compare prior treatment , mean shade change least two shade ( Vita Bleachguide 3D Master , Vita P/N : B361 ) measure middle one-third area labial surface select target teeth . Secondary endpoint : - Compared prior treatment , mean shade change 3 6 month least one shade ( Vita Bleachguide 3D Master , Vita P/N : B361 ) measure middle one-third area labial surface select target teeth . - Compared prior treatment , color change evaluate spectrophotometer ( VITA Easyshade Advance 4 ; VITA Zahnfabrik , Bad Sackingen , Germany ) , treatment , 3 6 month least one shade . ( Device high reliability , 96 % , Kim-Pusateri Et al . Reliability accuracy four dental shade-matching device . Journal Prosthetic Dentistry United States 2009 ; 101 ( March ( 3 ) ) :193-9 . ) - Compared prior treatment , mean shade change lower teeth number 43-33 treatment , 3 6 month least one shade . - Lesion gingiva upper low teeth ( +/- teeth number 33-43 , 13-23 treatment 3 month . - Compared prior treatment - teeth sensitivity cold touch stimulation - target teeth - VAS scale treatment , 3 6 month . For VAS , participant place line perpendicular 10-mm-long line zero one end indicate `` TS '' end indicate `` unbearable TS . '' - Patient oral questionnaire - post treatment , 7 day , 3 month , 6 month ( See ) . - Patient Reported Outcomes : ( Scale 0-4 ) . OHIP14—aesthetics question patient receive dental bleach - ( see ) - treatment 3 month . - Periodontal parameter baseline , 3 6 month : plaque index , sulcular bleeding index , pocket depth - target teeth . ( See detail ) . Inclusion criterion : 1 . Signed date Informed Consent Form . 2 . Normal control general health . 3 . Male female patient age 18-60 year old . 4 . Availability 37 week duration study . 5 . The patient least 4 natural teeth buccal restoration upper front area jaw ( teeth 13-23 ) , least 2 VITA shade > 15 , accordance VITA Bleachedguide 3D-MASTER ( P/N : B361 , VITA Zahnfabrik H Rauter GmbH & Co. KG , D-79713 Bad Sackingen , Germany ) . 6 . Females childbearing potential must non-pregnant non-lactating course study Exclusion criterion : 1 . Underwent teeth bleaching procedure last 3 year . 2 . Pockets > 5 mm BOP target area . 3 . Heavy smoker - > 10 cigarette per day . 4 . Tetracycline stain target teeth . 5 . Presence oral local mechanical factor could ( opinion Investigator ) influence outcome study . 6 . Presence dental restoration 2 teeth target area . 7 . Uncontrolled periodontitis sever gingival inflammation 8 . Scheduled simultaneous periodontal treatment . 9 . Presence orthodontic appliance , removable appliance . 10 . Presence soft hard tissue tumours oral cavity . 11 . Presence follow oral condition : major recurrent aphthous ulcer , stomatitis , abscess related oral pathology . 12 . The presence medical psychiatric condition condition , opinion Investigator , could affect successful participation patient study . 13 . Subject participate clinical study 30 day prior start study throughout study duration . 14 . Implanted pacemaker internal defibrillator , active electrical implant anywhere body 15 . Medical condition bleed disorder , leukaemia , cirrhosis , vascular disease , sarcoidosis , active hepatitis , HIV .
